text: The 1945 Denver Pioneers football team was an American football team that represented the University of Denver in the Mountain States Conference (MSC) during the 1945 college football season. In its fifth season under head coach Cac Hubbard, the team compiled a 4–5–1 record (4–1 against MSC opponents), won the conference championship, lost to New Mexico in the 1946 Sun Bowl, and outscored all opponents by a total of 201 to 182. ==Schedule== ==References== Denver Category:Denver Pioneers football seasons Category:Mountain States Conference football champion seasons Denver Pioneers football
title: 1945 Denver Pioneers football team
